title: Ravi & Nima Arc - Story Connection Map
description: Modular architecture allowing players to encounter Ravi and Nima in any order while maintaining coherent narrative.
design_principle: Vertical slice packets can be played independently or sequentially. All paths lead to same emotional climax but with different relation values.

entry_points.note: Alternative entry if player approaches Nima first instead of Ravi

ACT_1.description: Introduction. Meet Ravi or Nima. Learn of Ophina.

ACT_2.description: Ophina's story. Emotional depth. Crisis escalation. The Ask.
ACT_2.note: All players move to Act 3 regardless of choice, but with different influence values and Coherence impact

ACT_3.description: Triglyph Chamber journey. Boss encounter. Velinor reveal.
ACT_3.note: All paths lead to same climactic Velinor reveal, but emotional weight differs

ACT_4.note: Arc resolution. Influence values locked. Player ready for next arc.

tier_3.meaning: What you choose to leave behind

modularity_notes.independence: Each act is self-contained. Act 1 can be played, then later Acts 2-4. Arc pauses naturally at multiple points.
modularity_notes.replayability: Three major branch paths (Act 3 choice) create different emotional outcomes but same story resolution.
modularity_notes.arc_connectivity: End of Act 4 (RN_A4_P15) leaves player open to enter other NPC arcs. Ravi & Nima can be referenced/encountered later.
modularity_notes.order_flexibility: While this arc has linear progression, Ravi and Nima can be encountered before/after other NPCs. This arc doesn't require other NPCs to be done first.

authoring_workflow.step_1: Copy JSON files to local editor
authoring_workflow.step_2: Replace all NARRATION_* placeholders with prose (descriptions, atmosphere, passage transitions)
authoring_workflow.step_3: Replace all RAVI_LINE_* placeholders with Ravi's dialogue (26 unique lines across 5 tiers)
authoring_workflow.step_4: Replace all NIMA_LINE_* placeholders with Nima's dialogue (26 unique lines across 5 tiers)
authoring_workflow.step_5: Replace all PLAYER_CHOICE_* placeholders with player dialogue options
authoring_workflow.step_6: Replace all GLYPH_REVEAL_* placeholders with glyph tier 3 plaintext meanings
authoring_workflow.step_7: Test in game engine: verify all branches, gates, influence tracking
authoring_workflow.step_8: Run 3+ playthroughs: high empathy path, skepticism path, balanced path
authoring_workflow.step_9: Polish dialogue, adjust emotional beats, lock for next arc

quality_gates: All 73 placeholders filled with actual content
Ravi & Nima feel like distinct characters with unique voices (not similar)
Emotional beats land at intended moments (especially Act 3 climax)
Glyph progressions feel earned, not arbitrary
All three choice paths (acceptance, refusal, honest question) feel valid
3+ full playthroughs complete without breaking bugs
Influence values track correctly (start at 0.0, end at 0.5-0.8)
TONE stat impacts feel proportional to choices made
